title: Get help with child arrangements
introduction:
Parents may need to agree child arrangements (also known as custody) if they divorce or separate. For example, they may need to decide where the children will live and how much time they spend with each parent.

There are ways parents can prepare themselves before they begin negotiating arrangements. The process will be easier if parents know their legal rights, where they can get support and how to involve their children.

quicklinks.name: Help me to involve my ex in childcare arrangements
Find out whether you can apply for legal aid
